NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Produce and Distribution or the cell corresponding to Produce and Production?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Produce} and {Distribution} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Dairy and Exports or the cell corresponding to Produce and Prices?
